metadata.title: CVE-2018-6187 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
In Artifex MuPDF 1.12.0, there is a heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability in the do_pdf_save_document function in the pdf/pdf-write.c file. Remote attackers could leverage the vulnerability to cause a denial of service via a crafted pdf file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-6187` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

mupdf - 1.13.0+ds1-1
mupdf-tools - 1.13.0+ds1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mupdf package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.13.0+ds1-1').
